item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

I’m having a little trouble fully understanding how this works…

Please don’t flame me, I’m new to coding. All help is apreciated.

[code]public int canWear(int wearId, Player p) {
int cost = player.getPvpKills();

if (player.getPvpKills() < (cost)){
	p.sendMessage("You need "+cost+" kills to wear this item.");
	return cost;
}

switch(wearId) {
case -1:
return -1;

case 1050:
return cost = 10;

case 1040:
return cost = 100;

}
return 0;

}[/code]

NOTE: I did use eclipse so I might have useless things in there I do not need.

Read full topic
